price: 48. Qoladii ku sugnaa Al Acraaf (meelaha sare) waxay u dhawaaqi rag ay ku garan astaamahooda iyagoo ku odhan: Waxba idiin ma ay tarin urursigiinnii maalka, iyo iska weyneyntiinnii (Xaqa).
arabic: وَنَادَىٰٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَعۡرَافِ رِجَالٗا يَعۡرِفُونَهُم بِسِيمَىٰهُمۡ قَالُواْ مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنكُمۡ جَمۡعُكُمۡ وَمَا كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wanādā aṣḥābu al-aʿrāfi rijālan yaʿrifūnahum bisīmāhum qālū mā aghnā ʿankum jamʿukum wamā kuntum tastakbirūna
